items.title: Today only: Lenovo IdeaPad touchscreen Snapdragon Copilot+ PC at $400 Black Friday all-time low (Nearly 50% off)
items.summary:
Today only, as part of its Deals of the Day offers, Best Buy has listed Lenovo’s IdeaPad Slim 3x touchscreen Copilot+ laptop for $399.99 shipped. This model typically sells for $750, but it’s now down by a hefty 46%. It briefly hit $450 during the Prime Day sale earlier this year at Amazon and a couple of times afterward, but today’s deal shaves $350 off its usual going rate to mark a new best price to beat. It’s among the most affordable touchscreen Windows laptops you can snag right now as part of the ongoing Black Friday sale, so be sure to snag it after getting more details below.

items.title: Amazon’s official Ring Black Friday deals now live: Doorbell Pro $130, 5-pc. Alarm kit $100, more from $25
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing Black Friday Week Sale that is in full swing, Amazon is offering up to 50% discounts on a variety of its Ring devices, like the flagship Ring Battery Doorbell Pro at $129.99 shipped. It’s coming down from its recent $200 full price for the third time during this holiday event, with the prior two times happening only since late September. While there was an early-access Prime exclusive drop to this rate, it’s officially open to everyone now, giving you the means to update your home with a $70 price cut back to the lowest price we have tracked. Head below to learn more about it and all the other Ring devices we’re seeing benefit from this shopping event.

items.title: Heybike’s new-gen Ranger 3.0 Pro folding commuter e-bike gets first post-launch cut to $1,399 low for Black Friday
items.summary:
As part of Heybike’s ongoing Black Friday Sale, and coming in right alongside the new Mars 3.0 Folding e-bike price drop, we’re also now seeing the new Ranger 3.0 Pro Folding Fat-Tire e-bike getting a cut to $1,399 shipped and coming with a FREE Black Friday gift pack. This model was released alongside the Mars 3.0 back in August, and has remained at its $1,499 full price since the initial launch deals ended that month. Now, during this Black Friday season, the brand is offering the first post-launch discount we have seen, giving you another chance at $100 savings on an already lower-cost commuter solution at its best price that we have tracked. Of course, if you want an even more premium look, this model has a Limited Miami Sunset colorway option that has been given a price cut to $1,599 shipped, as well as a Black Friday gift pack and a Miami Sunset gift pack for more added goodies.

more…

items.title: Ninja’s latest CREAMi ice cream maker comes with soft-serve dispenser at new $297 Amazon Black Friday low, more
items.summary:
As part of Amazon’s ongoing Black Friday Week Sale, you can pick up Ninja’s CREAMi Scoop & Swirl Ice Cream and Soft Serve Maker at $297.49 shipped. It has spent most of the time since hitting the market in February keeping to its full $350 price tag, though we have seen three prior drops to $300 at Amazon since September. For Black Friday, things are going a little lower as this 15% markdown cuts $53 off the tag to land it at the best new price we have tracked at Amazon, with it beaten out by a drop to $290 from earlier in the year at an alternate marketplace. We’ve also collected all the other great Ninja kitchen gadgets that are seeing Black Friday savings below, as well, giving you one-stop shopping for all the brand’s discounted gear.

items.title: Nike’s official 2025 Black Friday sale is live and now even better: Up to 50% off + an extra 25% off with this code
items.summary:
Nike’s official Black Friday sale is now live, it’s easily one the best promos we’ve seen this season. For a limited time, you can score an extra 25% off a huge selection of Nike gear, including both sale and regular priced apparel with code BFRIDAY at checkout. Everything from sweats, winter clothes, and shoes gets an extra price drop. Shop the entire sale here.

Our top pick is the Nike Peak Futura Beanie, a timeless winter staple that’s offered in some of the coolest colorways out right now, from neutrals to this season’s trending  colors like highlighter pink, fuchsia, and brown. The beanie is made from recycled materials, making it both environmentally conscious and effortlessly cool. It’s been a go-to winter hat for years, you really can’t go wrong with a Nike beanie. It elevates your fit in an understated way, pairs with basically any outfit, and actually keeps you warm. Grab it in a few colors during this  Black Friday sale. If you’ve been eyeing a wardrobe refresh or want to knock out some early gifting, this is the kind of Nike deal you don’t wait on.

Our top picks from Nike:

***Note: The deal prices below are just the early Black Friday markdowns – using code BFRIDAY at checkout will knock an extra 25% off just about everything here.

  • Nike Air Max 2017 $162 (Orig. $190)
  • Nike Everyday Plus Cushioned Training Crew Socks (6 Pairs) $24 (Orig. $28)
  • Nike Dunk Low Retro $103 (Orig. $120)
  • Nike Peak Futura Beanie $26 (Orig. $30)
  • Nike Free Metcon 6 $94 (Orig. $125)
  • Air Jordan 1 Low $90 (Orig. $120)
  • Air Jordan 1 Mid $98 (Orig. $130)
  • Nike Challenger Men’s Dri-FIT Woven Running Pants $64 (Orig. $75)
  • Nike Life Men’s Fatigue Pants $111 (Orig. $130)
  • Don’t forget to use code BFRIDAY for an additional 25% off

Amazon’s Nike Black Friday sale is also live:

  • Nike Unisex Adult Calm Sandal $41 (Orig. $55)
  • Nike Unisex Adult Victori One Sandal $28 (Orig. $37)
  • Nike Men’s Air Max Excee Shoes $75 (Orig. $100)
  • Nike Men’s All Day Micro Stretch Long Leg Boxer Brief Underwear (3-Pack) $25 (Orig. $35)
  • Nike Men’s Air Max Nuaxis Shoes $67 (Orig. $90)
  • Nike Men’s Court Vision Mid Next Nature Shoes $56 (Orig. $95)
  • And even more deals here
